event-group.description: Used to setup player variables. no behavior changes

sub-events.comment: No player numbers need to be specified here

if Player not enabled nothing happens. This event isn't actually necessary, it's just a visual aid
If the player is not alive: Dying: HP=0 playing death animation, no controls | Not Dying: death animation finished, fully dead
If the player is alive: Restrained: player can't move, can still be hurt. Hurt: player can't move, can't be restrained but may remain like so if previously affected.

event-group.title: Player Jump, Double Jump, Wall jump

sub-events.comment: Manage ground speeds nested for organization
